parts.name: checkbox
parts.description: The wrapper element that contains slotted <input type="checkbox">.

parts.name: label
parts.description: The wrapper element that contains slotted <label>.

states.description: Set when the checkbox is pressed down, either with mouse, touch or the keyboard.
Set when the checkbox is disabled.
Set when the checkbox is focused using the keyboard.
Set when the checkbox is focused.
Set when the checkbox is in the indeterminate state.
Set when the checkbox is checked.
Set when the checkbox has a label.
